mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, u.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_seq = u.user_seq ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT b.board_id, u.user_name, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset};
select count(*) from board where title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%');
SELECT b.board_id, u.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count FROM board b, users u WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId} and b.user_seq = u.user_seq
mapper.insert: insert into board (user_seq, title, content, reg_dt, read_count) values (#{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0);
